name: The Quest for the S'mores
description:
Warning: this game involves themes of intrusive thoughts and self-hate. If these are topics that would adversely affect your well-being, please do not play this game.

The game is about Jesse (the player’s character) who is going on their first camping trip with friends. Jesse finds a magical quest book that guides them on their quest to gather all the materials for the perfect s’mores campout. Throughout their camping trip, Jesse has intrusive thoughts about their struggles with perfectionism which is focused on the s’mores campout going perfectly.

There are five possible endings the player can receive and the game lets you easily replay it to discover all the endings. If you enjoyed the first playthrough of this game, I encourage you to restart from the first time at camp and choose options you didn't the first time.
